dojo4/maurizio-the-microsite.title: ! 'Maurizio: The Microsite'
dojo4/maurizio-the-microsite.body:
Over the course of several days last month dojo4 created a simple, beautiful microsite for director/producer Maura Axelrod on her forthcoming documentary, Maurizio Cattelan: The Movie.

If you’re not familiar with Cattelan’s work, I suggest going straight to a Google image search for a punch-in-the-stomach-style introduction to this contemporary Italian artist’s oeuvre. The New York Times’ Artsbeat blog featured Maura’s doc last month, aptly describing Cattelan as a mix of, “Surrealist whimsy with a darkly comic view of life in the 21st century.”

Watch the trailer and brace yourself for Maurizio Cattelan: The Movie in 2015!
